english_example_sentence: In this world, after living a beautiful life, we will die peacefully.
russian_example_sentence: В этом мире, прожив прекрасную жизнь, мы умрем спокойно.
turkish_example_sentence: Bu dünyada güzel bir hayat yaşayıp huzurlu öleceğiz.
